com.coolbitx.wallet.signing.utils

Class ScriptAssembler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.coolbitx.wallet.signing.utils.ScriptAssembler

  • public class ScriptAssembler
extends Object
    This ScriptAssembler class provide all the function to generator single script, you can concatenate all the script to become a signing script for CoolWallet Pro that can sign any cryptocurrency with any supported algorithm.
    Author:
    Hank Liu (hankliu@coolbitx.com)

      • switchString

        public static String switchString(ScriptData conditionData,
                                  ScriptData.Buffer destinationBuf,
                                  String stringArray)
        Copy string to destination buffer with switch condition.
        Parameters:
        conditionData - One byte condition data, number only( "00","01","02"...). For example, if the condition data is "01", will copy the second(start from zero) string in the stringArray to destination buffer. If conditionData is greater the the size of stringArray or less zero will throw 0x6A0D error.
        destinationBuf - The destination buffer.
        stringArray - The string array concatenate with comma(ex. "A,B,C,D").
        Returns:

      • copyRegularString

        public static String copyRegularString(ScriptData data)
        Copy buffer data and put the output to transaction buffer. At the same time will check whether the data is in range of asc-ii code encode (0x20~0x7e, except 0x23(")) or not.
        Parameters:
        data -
        Returns:

      • copyRegularString

        public static String copyRegularString(ScriptData data,
                                       ScriptData.Buffer destinationBuf)
        Copy buffer data and put the output to destination buffer. At the same time will check whether the data is in range of asc-ii code encode (0x20~0x7e, except 0x23(")) or not.
        Parameters:
        data -
        destinationBuf - The destination buffer.
        Returns:

      • baseConvert

        public static String baseConvert(ScriptData data,
                                 ScriptData.Buffer destinationBuf,
                                 int outputLimit,
                                 String charset,
                                 int baseConvertArg)
        Convert the data encode and put the output to destination buffer.
        Parameters:
        data - The data should to encode.
        destinationBuf - The destination of the encoded data.
        outputLimit - The limit length of encoded result.
        charset - The name of the charset requested: "binaryCharset", "hexadecimalCharset", "bcdCharset", "decimalCharset", "binary32Charset", "base32BitcoinCashCharset", "base58Charset", "extentetCharset".
        baseConvertArg - The number of the base-enoding requested: leftJustify = 0x01, littleEndian = 0x02, zeroInherit = 0x04, bitLeftJustify8to5 = 0x08, inLittleEndian = 0x10.
        Returns:

      • hash

        public static String hash(ScriptData data,
                          ScriptData.Buffer destinationBuf,
                          int hashType)
        Bech32 hash data and put the output to destination buffer.
        Parameters:
        data - The input data.
        destinationBuf - The destination buffer.
        hashType - SHA1 = 0x01, SHA256 = 0x02, SHA512 = 0x03, SHA3256 = 0x04, SHA3512 = 0x05, Keccak256 = 0x06, Keccak512 = 0x07, RipeMD160 = 0x08, SHA256RipeMD160 = 0x09, DoubleSHA256 = 0x0D, CRC16 = 0x0A, Blake2b512 = 0x0F;
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        destinationBuf - The destination buffer.

      • paddingZero

        public static String paddingZero(ScriptData.Buffer destinationBuf,
                                 int base)
        Padding zero to the destination buffer.
        Parameters:
        destinationBuf - Destination buffer.
        base - The number of padding zero is the base minus the remainder of bufferInt divided by base(base - (bufferInt % base)).
        Returns:

      • ifEqual

        public static String ifEqual(ScriptData argData,
                             String expect,
                             String trueStatement,
                             String falseStatement)
        If argData equals to expect, the the card execute the trueStatement, otherwise execute the falseStatement.
        Parameters:
        argData - Requirement.
        expect - Analyzing conditions.
        trueStatement - The script wanna execute when the status is true.
        falseStatement - The script wanna execute when the status is false.
        Returns:

      • ifRange

        public static String ifRange(ScriptData argData,
                             String min,
                             String max,
                             String trueStatement,
                             String falseStatement)
        If the value of argData lies between min and max(min ≤ argData ≤ max) then run trueStatement; if not, please run falseStatement.
        Parameters:
        argData - Requirement.
        min - The min value of the range.
        max - The min value of the range.
        trueStatement - The script wanna execute when the status is true.
        falseStatement - The script wanna execute when the status is false.
        Returns:

      • ifSigned

        public static String ifSigned(ScriptData argData,
                              ScriptData signData,
                              String trueStatement,
                              String falseStatement)
        Use CoolBitX public key to verify that the signature is valid or not. If the result is true, the the card execute the trueStatement, otherwise execute the falseStatement.
        Parameters:
        argData - Requirement.
        signData - The encoded ECDSA(CBKey) signature. Signing: SHA256(argData).
        trueStatement - The script wanna execute when the status is true.
        falseStatement - The script wanna execute when the status is false.
        Returns:
